trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs> data includes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> associated with the event and the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Added> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs> dati includono il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> associato all'evento e <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> di <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Added> o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Deleted>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction,System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation)" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction,System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation)" />.

trans-unit.source: An action <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Added" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Deleted" /> value that identifies the operation performed.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Added" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction.Deleted" /> dell'azione che identifica l'operazione eseguita.

trans-unit.source: The annotation affected is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'annotazione interessata è specificata nel <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> that changed in the store.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> che è cambiato nell'archivio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> that changed in the store.

The operation performed with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione eseguita con il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> specificato da di <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Action%2A> proprietà.
